title: IWC EXCAVATION
author: ''
date: '2022-08-30'
slug: iwc_excavation
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $708.5K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with IWC EXCAVATION. The average
  contract duration was 1.35 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.8M.
  The longest contract was 2.4 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $5.2M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '708.5K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '5'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '3'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '60%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '21%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '1.33'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '533.3K'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '1.35'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '1.8M'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '2.4'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '5.2M'
